嶽.definition: high mountain; highest peak of a mountain ridge

嶽塘.definition: Yuetan district of Xiangtan city 湘潭市[Xiang1 tan2 shi4], Hunan

嶽塘區.definition: Yuetan district of Xiangtan city 湘潭市[Xiang1 tan2 shi4], Hunan

嶽麓.definition: Yuelu district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan

嶽麓區.definition: Yuelu district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan

嶽麓書院.definition: Yuelu Academy in Changsha, Hunan, famous ancient academy
